game.name: Quakespasm - Aftershock
game.desc: Aftershock for Quake is a commercial add-on for Quake with 4 new episodes developed by HeadGames Publishing, Inc.

game.name: Quakespasm - Arcane Dimensions
game.desc: Arcane Dimensions was created by a large community team of level designers, artists and coders over many years and the latest version has finally been released. This mod is all about projectile combat, breakable environments and encouraging all players to become multi dimensional explorers! The mod features 30+ richly detailed and uniquely themed environments to explore and a whole new army of monsters to test your skill and reflexes along the way. The beginning of the mod is full of portals in all directions that are visually themed by what lies beyond their black star veils. There is no fixed order or preferred path to how you explore this mod, the choice is yours.

game.name: Quakespasm - Dimension of the Machine
game.desc: In the deepest depths of the labyrinth lies the core of lava and steel known only as The Machine. Crusade across time and space against the forces of evil to bring together the lost runes, power the dormant machine, and open the portal hiding the greatest threat to all known worldsâ€”destroy it...before it destroys us all.

game.name: Quakespasm - Dimension of the Past
game.desc: Dimension of the Past (called "DOPA" for short) is an add-on episode for Quake developed by MachineGames, to commemorate the game's 20th anniversary.

game.name: Quakespasm - Dissolution of Eternity
game.desc: Two new episodes. Sixteen new levels. One way out.
game.publisher: Activision, id Software, Valve, Virgin, Pulse

game.name: Quakespasm - Insomnia
game.desc: Large, intricate levels with great gameplay and connectivity, offset with interesting details and clever design. The start map is followed by 2 a2base and a q3gothic map.

game.name: Quakespasm - Quake
game.desc: Quake is a first-person shooter video game developed by id Software and published by GT Interactive in 1996.

game.name: Quakespasm - Q!Zone
game.desc: The Quake death squads are back for more bloody battle. This time they won't stop until total victory or total annihilation. Earth's counter offense calls on its best man (you) to wipe out the leader of the Quake dominion.

game.name: Quakespasm - Scourge of Armagon
game.desc: Quake Mission Pack 1: Scourge of Armagon is the first official mission pack for Quake
